sn2.23:4.1: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho serī devaputto bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn2.23:11.1: Bhūtapubbāhaṃ, bhante, sirī nāma rājā ahosiṃ dāyako dānapati dānassa vaṇṇavādī.
sn2.23:11.2: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, catūsu dvāresu dānaṃ dīyittha samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ.
sn2.23:11.3: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, itthāgāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn2.23:11.4: ‘devassa kho dānaṃ dīyati;
sn2.23:11.6: Sādhu mayampi devaṃ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
sn2.23:11.10: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, paṭhamaṃ dvāraṃ itthāgārassa adāsiṃ.
sn2.23:12.1: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, khattiyā anuyantā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ:
sn2.23:12.5: Sādhu mayampi devaṃ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
sn2.23:12.9: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, dutiyaṃ dvāraṃ khattiyānaṃ anuyantānaṃ adāsiṃ.
sn2.23:12.10: Tattha khattiyānaṃ anuyantānaṃ dānaṃ dīyittha, mama dānaṃ paṭikkami.
sn2.23:13.1: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, balakāyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn2.23:13.6: Sādhu mayampi devaṃ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
sn2.23:13.10: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, tatiyaṃ dvāraṃ balakāyassa adāsiṃ.
sn2.23:13.11: Tattha balakāyassa dānaṃ dīyittha, mama dānaṃ paṭikkami.
sn2.23:14.1: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, brāhmaṇagahapatikā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ:
sn2.23:14.7: Sādhu mayampi devaṃ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
sn2.23:14.11: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, catutthaṃ dvāraṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ adāsiṃ.
sn2.23:14.12: Tattha brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ dānaṃ dīyittha, mama dānaṃ paṭikkami.
sn2.23:15.1: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, purisā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ:
sn2.23:15.2: ‘na kho dāni devassa koci dānaṃ dīyatī’ti.
sn2.23:15.3: Evaṃ vuttāhaṃ, bhante, te purise etadavocaṃ:
sn2.23:15.4: ‘tena hi, bhaṇe, yo bāhiresu janapadesu āyo sañjāyati tato upaḍḍhaṃ antepure pavesetha, upaḍḍhaṃ tattheva dānaṃ detha samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānan’ti.
sn2.23:15.5: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, evaṃ dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ puññānaṃ evaṃ dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pariyantaṃ nādhigacchāmi—
sn2.23:15.6: ettakaṃ puññanti vā ettako puññavipākoti vā ettakaṃ sagge ṭhātabbanti vāti.
